content: In SDC, I have an instance where both the value set and code system are contained. There's a special extension that allows a valueset to point to the local contained URL of the value set in addition to the contained URL. However, it doesn't seem to be working properly, as codes that definitely exist in the value set are being flagged as invalid.
the definition of that extension is pretty obscure
I believe you told me to create it :)
I'm happy to make it less obscure. Objective is to indicate where to find the canonical resource
"Allows a direct reference to the code system for FHIR query." - that's much less informative than what you just said
that's not much fun. Every single place that extension ever gets used is going to hurt...
anyway, in questionnaires, will work from next release
